Text: HOPE curriculum:  The tools supplied in order to complete the course are lecture videos with PowerPoint and clinical tool kits that include: clinical algorithms’, assessment forms for patients, handouts and brochures containing information on healthy living and childhood obesity, and resource lists of places more information pertaining to the program.
